attributes.action: abandon plans to share NHS information
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Governments plans to allow the Department of Health to share information on NHS databases with other ministries and private companies This move has already been condemned by the BMA. Moves to share such information could easily be abused and could potentially discourage people suffering from sensitive illnesses (STDs, Mental health issues, HIV etc) from seeking help. Given the poor track record of protecting data from loss this seems an ill-advised move with no discernible benefit and should be scrapped immediately
